title: Legacy Feature - No UUID
body:
# Legacy Feature Implementation

This is a GitHub issue that was created before UUID support was added to the sync system.

## Overview

This issue represents the legacy format where issues were identified solely by their issue number.

## Implementation Tasks

- [x] Core functionality implementation
- [x] Basic testing
- [ ] Integration with new UUID system
- [ ] Migration to UUID-based identification

## Migration Notes

When this issue is next synced with a spec that has a UUID, the sync system should:

1. Embed the UUID metadata in this issue body
2. Update the issue to include the UUID comment
3. Maintain all existing content

## Current Status

- **Created**: Before UUID system
- **Last Updated**: Manual edit
- **Sync Status**: Pending migration
- **UUID Status**: Not present

milestone.title: Legacy Migration
milestone.description: Migration of legacy issues to UUID system
